masterGrammar.rule: rule {S option start.symbol - optional elements initial} S = (Conj) (PP_1) ((AdvP_2) AdvP_1) (PP_2) {IP / CP} <S head> = <IP head> <S head> = <CP head> <S head type topic> = - <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = - <IP head fronted cat> = none <CP head type root> = + <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = - <AdvP_2 head type manner> = - <S head adverbial> <= <AdvP_1> <S head> == [type:[locative:+ | keep locative inside VP within AdvP_1 verbheaded:-]] -> ~[adverbial:[head:[type:[motion:+]]]] <S option> = start.symbol

rule {S option start.topicinit - topic initial, optional elements initial} S = (Conj) (PP_1) ((AdvP_2) AdvP_1) TopicP (PP_2) {IP / CP} <S head> = <IP head> <S head> = <CP head> <S head topicP> = <TopicP> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = - <IP head fronted cat> = none <CP head type root> = + <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = - <AdvP_2 head type manner> = - <S head type topic> <= + | <TopicP head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character <S head adverbial> <= <AdvP_1> <S head> == [type:[locative:+ | keep locative inside VP within AdvP_1 verbheaded:-]] -> ~[adverbial:[head:[type:[motion:+]]]] <S option> = start.topicinit

rule {S option start.topicfin - optional elements initial, topic final} S = (Conj) (PP_1) ((AdvP_2) AdvP_1) (PP_2) {IP / CP} TopicP <S head> = <IP head> <S head> = <CP head> <S head topicP> = <TopicP> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = - <IP head fronted cat> = none <CP head type root> = + <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = - <AdvP_2 head type manner> = - <S head type topic> <= + | <IP head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character | <CP head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character <S head adverbial> <= <AdvP_1> <S head> == [type:[locative:+ | keep locative inside VP within AdvP_1 verbheaded:-]] -> ~[adverbial:[head:[type:[motion:+]]]] <S option> = start.topicfin

rule {S option start.NegVAdvRequired - optional elements initial} S = (Conj) (PP_1) ((AdvP_2) AdvP_1) (PP_2) {IP / CP} <S head> = <IP head> <S head> = <CP head> <S head type topic> = - <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = - <IP head fronted cat> = none <CP head type root> = + <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = - <AdvP_2 head type manner> = - <S head adverbial> <= <AdvP_1> <S head> == [type:[locative:+ | keep locative inside VP within AdvP_1 verbheaded:-]] -> ~[adverbial:[head:[type:[motion:+]]]] <S head> == [adverbial:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if adverbial negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <S option> = start.NegVAdvRequired

rule {S option start.topicinit.NegVAdvRequired - topic initial, optional elements initial} S = (Conj) (PP_1) ((AdvP_2) AdvP_1) TopicP (PP_2) {IP / CP} <S head> = <IP head> <S head> = <CP head> <S head topicP> = <TopicP> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = - <IP head fronted cat> = none <CP head type root> = + <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = - <AdvP_2 head type manner> = - <S head type topic> <= + | <TopicP head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character <S head adverbial> <= <AdvP_1> <S head> == [type:[locative:+ | keep locative inside VP within AdvP_1 verbheaded:-]] -> ~[adverbial:[head:[type:[motion:+]]]] <S head> == [adverbial:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if adverbial negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <S option> = start.topicinit.NegVAdvRequired

rule {S option start.topicfin.NegVAdvRequired - optional elements initial, topic final} S = (Conj) (PP_1) ((AdvP_2) AdvP_1) (PP_2) {IP / CP} TopicP <S head> = <IP head> <S head> = <CP head> <S head topicP> = <TopicP> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = - <IP head fronted cat> = none <CP head type root> = + <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = - <AdvP_2 head type manner> = - <S head type topic> <= + | <IP head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character | <CP head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character <S head adverbial> <= <AdvP_1> <S head> == [type:[locative:+ | keep locative inside VP within AdvP_1 verbheaded:-]] -> ~[adverbial:[head:[type:[motion:+]]]] <S head> == [adverbial:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if adverbial negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <S option> = start.topicfin.NegVAdvRequired

rule {S option conjoinedS containing a topic} S = S_1 Conj S_2 <S head> = <S_2 head> {<S_1 head type topic> = + /<S_2 head type topic> = + } <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <S_2 head type verbheaded> = + <S conjoined> = + <S_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <S head type prefix> = <S_1 head type prefix> <S option> = conjoinedS

rule {S option conjPrefix - conjoined S containing a topic} S = S_1 S_2 <S head> = <S_2 head> {<S_1 head type topic> = + /<S_2 head type topic> = + } <S conjoined> = + <S_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <S_2 head type prefix conj> = + <S head type prefix> <= <S_1 head type prefix> <S option> = conjPrefix

rule {S option conjSuffix - conjoined S containing a topic} S = S_1 S_2 <S head> = <S_2 head> {<S_1 head type topic> = + /<S_2 head type topic> = + } <S conjoined> = + <S_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <S_1 head type suffix conj> = + <S head type prefix> <= <S_1 head type prefix> <S option> = conjSuffix

rule {S option conjNone - conjoined S containing a topic} S = S_1 S_2 <S head> = <S_2 head> {<S_1 head type topic> = + /<S_2 head type topic> = + } <S conjoined> = + <S_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <S_2 head type prefix conj> = - <S_1 head type suffix conj> = - <S_1 head type comma> = - <S head type prefix> <= <S_1 head type prefix> <S option> = conjNone

rule {S option greeting} S = Greet (DP) <S head> = <Greet head> <DP head type temporal> = - <DP head type quantifier> = - <DP head type locative> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type topic> = - <DP head type focus> = - <DP head infl polarity> = positive <S option> = greet
rule {S option interjection} S = Intj / Adj <S head> = <Intj head> <S head> = <Adj head> <S option> = interjection
rule {S option excl.init} S = Excl AdjP <S head> = <AdjP head> <Excl head type excl-initial> = + <S option> = excl.init
rule {S option excl.fin} S = AdjP Excl <S head> = <AdjP head> <Excl head type excl-final> = + <S option> = excl.fin
rule {S option excl.both} S = Excl_1 AdjP Excl_2 <S head> = <AdjP head> <Excl_1 head type excl-initial> = + <Excl_2 head type excl-final> = + <S option> = excl.both
